entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain early this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
